Title: Davido celebrates 2026 Grammy nomination, says ‘Job not done’
Summary: David Adeleke, popularly known as Davido, has celebrated his latest Grammy nomination ahead of the 2026 awards ceremony . In a video shared on his Instagram page on Friday, Davido was seen dancing to his hit song With Your Friend . Davido says ‘Job not done’

Title: #AnambraDecides2025: As Anambra votes, early turnout remains low amid citizen scepticism
Summary: The governorship election commenced at exactly 8:30 a.m. on Saturday at Udeozo Primary School, Awka, in Awka South Local Government Area . Officials of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) began accreditation simultaneously at the three polling units .

Title: Nigeria losing billions due to weak copyright protection – Prof. Odunaike
Summary: Prof. Dorcas Odunaike urged lawmakers to expand the 2022 Copyright Act to better protect performers’ rights in the country . She made the call during Babcock University’s 56th annual lecture .

Title: Doctors threaten total service shutdown in FCT over colleague’s abduction
Summary: Members of the Nigerian Medical Association, Federal Capital Territory (NMA-FCT) chapter, have threatened a total shutdown of services and to embark on a peaceful protest over the alleged inaction of security agencies to rescue their colleague, Dr. Chinonye Nwachukwu .

Title: #AnambraDecides2025: Observers express confidence in peaceful poll as security tightens
Summary: Civil society groups have expressed confidence that the governorship election will hold peacefully despite heavy deployment of security operatives across Anambra State . Speaking during an election monitoring exercise, Jake Epelle said he was confident that the election will be peaceful .

Title: Lawmaker, Commissioner, commend smooth conduct of Anambra governorship election
Summary: Mrs Ifeoma Azikiwe made the commendation at her Ward 4, Ogbeabu Square, polling unit 003 on Saturday in Onitsha . She is a member of the All Progressive Grand Alliance (APGA) member representing Anambra North Constituency 1 .

Title: 2026 W’Cup Play-offs: Drama as Cameroon coach, federation clash over squad reveal
Summary: FECAFOOT wants a formal, publicised announcement from its headquarters, requiring the coach’s physical presence,’a source within the federation told CamerounWeb .

Title: Obi, Moghalu vote in Anambra, raise alarm over vote buying
Summary: Peter Obi and George Moghalu cast their votes in Anambra State election . Both expressed concern over widespread vote buying in the state . The Labour Party presidential candidate in 2023, Mr. Peter Obi, and the party’s governorship candidate in the ongoing Anambura State election, George Mo Ghalu,

Title: Anambra’ 25: Yiaga Africa commends INEC early arrival of materials, personnel
Summary: Yiaga Africa commends INEC for early arrival of election materials and personnel at Anambra election . The NGO gave the commendation at the Community Primary School, Amawbia, Awka South LGA on Saturday .

Title: Anambra 2025: Make our votes count – Electorate urge INEC
Summary: Anambra 2025: Make our votes count – Electorate urge INEC . The voters made the call after casting their votes at the Agbola II polling unit in Awka South .
